insights_header.set_default_dashboard_error: Failure when defining the Dashboard {dashboard} as homepage

generate_insight.title: Generate insight
generate_insight.error: We're sorry, but unfortunately we were unable to generate an Insight, please check your internet connection or try again later
generate_insight.prompt: Analyze the performance of a human service operation's results dashboard. The dashboard displays three main categories: calls in progress, closed and waiting. In addition, evaluate the following metrics: first response time, waiting time and interaction time. Identify efficiency patterns, possible bottlenecks in the service flow and offer suggestions for optimizing response time and team productivity. Data: {values}

edit_dashboard.title: Edit dashboard
edit_dashboard.delete_dashboard_notice: This action will be irreversible. To confirm the action, please type the name of the dashboard

delete_dashboard.title: Delete dashboard
delete_dashboard.notice: This action will be irreversible. To confirm the action, please type the name of the dashboard

create_dashboard.title: Create a custom Dashboard
create_dashboard.description: Create as many Dashboards as you want. Click on New dashboard to get started

define_metric.title: Define metric
define_metric.description: Click here to define the metric you want to view

select_widget_type.title: Select widget
select_widget_type.description: Select the type of metric you want to configure. If you have any questions, start by testing Executions

set_metric.title: Defining metric
set_metric.description: After selecting the type of metric, choose a flow that brings relevant values to your operation, fill in the rest, and save!

define_metric.title: Defining metrics for the chart
define_metric.description: Select the main flows of your operation to generate a funnel visualization and track the journey of your contacts

fill_metric.title: Fill metrics
fill_metric.description: Provide an easy name for your metric and select the flow from which you want to count the executions
